Property.name: unknownLong4
Property.title: Unknown (Id?)
Property.comment: (Unique except 0)

Property.name: unknownLong5
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: 1 for some ships... 0 otherwise

Property.name: acceleration
Property.title: Acceleration
Property.comment: acceleration = deceleration

Property.name: unknownFloat6
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: has something to do with turning speed

Property.name: unknownLong10
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: 1 for airplanes, else 0

Property.name: fuelCapacity
Property.title: Fuel Capacity
Property.comment: In Action Mode +50%

Property.name: unknownLong11
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: seems to be 1 for some ships, else 0

Property.name: unknownFloat8
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: the bigger the value, the less the unit needs to turn to attack

Property.name: targetFlags
Property.title: Target Mode
Property.comment: Some kind of pattern on what can be targeted

Property.name: unknownLong20
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: mostly 1, zero for stone and gold mines; cavalier and leo 451 have special values... could be booleans...

Property.name: unknownLong21
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: mostly 0, could be a bitmask...

Property.name: unknownLong26
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: some kind of type of object? 0 = ambient stuff, 1 = resources stuff, 2 = buildings, 3 = aircraft, 4 = ship, 5 = ground unit, 6 = citizens, repair workers... there are some others also

Property.name: buildingRate
Property.title: Building rate
Property.comment: could be close to ms?! However time between amount is built

Property.name: unknownFloat200
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: for sure also a rate... iron from empire earth?

Property.name: goldGatherRate
Property.title: Gold gather rate
Property.comment: could be close to ms?! However time until 1 gold unit is picked

Property.name: stoneGatherRate
Property.title: Stone gather rate
Property.comment: could be close to ms?! However time until 1 stone unit is picked

Property.name: animalFoodGatherRate
Property.title: Animal food gather rate
Property.comment: also fish

Property.name: unknown8
Property.title: Unknown
Property.comment: 2 for citizens, 0 otherwise
